Headline: #49 Western Temporary Reroute at Western/69th
ShortDescription: 49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, 63rd, Damen, 69th, and Western due to, street blockage near Western/69th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, 63rd, Damen, 69th, and Western due to, street blockage near Western/69th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #J14 Jeffery Jump & #15 Jeffery Local Temporary Reroute at Jeffery/70th
ShortDescription: J14 Jeffery Jump & 15 Jeffery Local buses are temp rerouted via Jeffery, 73rd, Yates, South Shore, 67th, Jeffery due to street blockage near Jeffery/70th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#J14 Jeffery Jump & #15 Jeffery Local buses are temporarily rerouted via Jeffery, 73rd, Yates, South Shore, 67th, and Jeffery due to street blockage near Jeffery/70th.

Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Reroute near Jeffery/70th
ShortDescription: 71 71st/South Shore buses temp rerouted WB Yates, S.Shore, 67th, Stony Island, 71st; EB 71st, Stony Island, 73rd, Exchange due to blockage near Jeffery/70th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Jeffery/70th, due to street blockage.

Westbound buses will operate via Yates, S.Shore, 67th, Stony Island, and 71st.

Eastbound buses will operate via 71st, Stony Island, 73rd, Exchange.

Allow extra travel time.
